About Our Test Site

Home | Blog | Contact

Our Mission

This test site exists to validate the functionality of HTML to Markdown conversion tools.

What We Test

  1. Title and metadata extraction
  2. Content structure preservation
  3. Link processing and validation
  4. Multiple file handling

Technical Details

Our testing framework includes:

generateLlmsTxtArtifacts()

This function processes HTML files and generates llms.txt artifacts.
